value:
$WmMPID_スリーズ声,ch90_02_FighterAX_M_Normal,Face|$Nu...
$Nu...$k$pHello, there! I spoke to you once
before, in a dream like this... Do you
remember me?$k$pI am Gunnthrá, eldest princess of Nifl,
the Kingdom of Ice.$k$pOh, $Nu...$k$pHow relieved I am to learn that you
are unharmed.$k$pAre the battles against Múspell taking
a toll on you?$k$pIf only we could meet face-to-face, I
would do what I could to ease your
burden.$k$pOh, but... As before, time is short
and we have something more
pressing to discuss.$k$pIt is time you come to Nifl. You must,
$Nu.$k$pSurtr is unquenchable, undying...
And separated, we in Nifl and all of
you in Askr cannot defeat him.$k$pHowever, if we come together, hope
still lives...$k$p$Sbs150|

$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The forces of Múspell, led by Surtr,
are continuing their invasion of Askr.$k$pHis Highness, King Gustav, is leading
the Royal Knights in defense of the
realm.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Father...$k$p$WmMPID_アンナ,ch00_03_Anna_F_Normal,Face_Anger|The Royal Knights are using the
Order of Heroes' intelligence to plan
their movements.$k$pThey're doing their best to avoid a
confrontation with Surtr himself.$k$pThis means that, inevitably, they're
being sidelined...$k$pRight now, all they can do is buy time.
I do not believe this tactic will
continue to be effective.$k$pAs the main force retreats, any
soldiers who lag behind are being
burned alive by Surtr...$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Pain|Despicable.$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|$Nu?$k$pMy sister... Gunnthrá... She told you
that you must head to Nifl, correct?$k$pLet us go together. My sister is well
versed in the rites and the magic of
our realm.$k$pShe must know of something that will
let us fight back.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|Something we can use to oppose
Surtr lies in Nifl? Truly?$k$p$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|I believe so. I think that what we in
Nifl could not accomplish alone is
possible if we join with Askr.$k$p$WmMPID_アルフォンス,ch00_01_Alfons_M_Normal,Face_Anger|If that is so, let us journey to Nifl.$k$pWe must find a means to fight back
as soon as possible.$k$pIf we don't... It will mean the end of
Askr.$k$p$Sbs1000|

$SbpBGM_EVENT_PLAIN_03,0|$WmMPID_フィヨルム,ch00_06_Fjorm_F_Normal,Face|I shall lead the way. We leave for Nifl
at once.$k$p$Sbs150|
